name: Arcane Bolt
description: Hurl a bolt of pure magical energy at a single foe. Damage scales with INT and proficiency.

messages.cast: You hurl an arcane bolt at $target.

name: Leviathan's Fire
description: Unleash a torrent of dragon fire in an area around your target. High damage with a reflex save. Devastating against groups.

name: Mend
description: Cast golden healing light on yourself or an ally. Healing scales with WIS. Essential for survival.

messages.hit: Golden light washes over $target, mending $healing wounds!

name: Shadow Veil
description: Weave shadows around your foe's eyes, blinding them and reducing their armor. Will save resists.

name: Ephemeral Step
description: Shimmer out of reality, becoming ephemeral and hard to strike. Duration scales with WIS.

name: Path Shift
description: Vanish in a flash of light and reappear at a distant location. High mana cost, powerful escape.

affect.name: path_shift
affect.description: You vanish in a flash of light!

messages.hit: You vanish in a flash of light!
messages.cast_room: $actor vanishes in a flash of light!

name: Winter's Whisper
description: Whisper an icy incantation that freezes your foe with cold damage. Reflex save for half.

name: Knowing
description: Magically examine an object or creature to discern its true nature and properties.

messages.hit: You come to know the true nature of $target.

name: Slash
description: A fundamental melee attack with your weapon. No mana cost. Damage scales with STR and proficiency.

messages.cast: You slash at $target with your weapon!

name: Power Attack
description: A devastating overhead strike with all your strength behind it. Deals significantly more damage with longer cooldown. Requires STR 18 to learn from Nissa.

messages.cast: You raise your weapon high and strike $target with all your might!
messages.hit: $actor's devastating blow strikes you for $damage damage!
messages.cast_room: $actor raises their weapon and delivers a devastating blow to $target!

name: Defensive Stance
description: Adopt a defensive posture, reducing incoming damage. You become harder to hit but deal reduced damage yourself. Lasts until you attack. Requires CON 18 to learn from the Aina Fighter.

messages.cast: You adopt a defensive stance, ready to block incoming attacks.

name: Riposte
description: A quick counter-attack executed with precision and timing. Deals good damage with a medium cooldown. Requires DEX 18 to learn from Harald the Barkeeper.

messages.cast: You see an opening and riposte at $target!
messages.hit: $actor's riposte catches you off guard for $damage damage!

name: Cleave
description: Swing your weapon in a wide arc, hitting all enemies in a small area. Powerful group attack. Requires STR 20 to learn from the Desert Nomad.

messages.cast: You swing your weapon in a wide arc!
messages.hit: $actor's cleaving strike catches you for $damage damage!
messages.cast_room: $actor swings their weapon in a wide, devastating arc hitting everything nearby!
